desc: Lucky Bug Clothing is a sustainable children’s brand that focuses on colorful, hand-drawn prints and FUN. Our products are made of super-soft organic bamboo fabric and made in small batches in Brooklyn, NY. Soft, Sustainable, Sweat-shop Free. Our organic onesies make the perfect (and easy!) baby shower gift.

layout.text: Lucky Bug Clothing is a sustainable children’s brand that focuses on colorful, hand-drawn prints and FUN. Our products are made of super-soft organic bamboo fabric and made in small batches in Brooklyn, NY
